content.body: I've found nothing that does anything with the "download" value for request initiator: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#downloading-resources:concept-request-initiator - annevk do you know why it exists?

content.body: I looked through all usages linked from https://dontcallmedom.github.io/webdex/i.html#initiator%40%40request%40dfn
zcorpan: maybe look at blame for Fetch? I think it was CSP, but thinking around download has evolved so maybe it's no-op code... (It should really be a property of navigation.)
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: maybe look at blame for Fetch? I think it was CSP, but thinking around download has evolved so maybe it's no-op code... (It should really be a property of navigation.)

content.body: annevk: ok. Clicking <a download href> doesn't go through the navigate algorithm per spec
content.formatted_body: annevk: ok. Clicking <a download href> doesn't go through the navigate algorithm per spec
